questionNoAds: Do you want to upgrade to the premium version without ads?
questionExit: Do you want to leave the game?
tipMoveCamera: Move around the map using swaps.
tipJoystickMove: Press the button on the hexagonal pad to move all the boulders according to the application.
tipJoystickRotate: Click and rotate the hexagon panel to change the viewing angle.
tipMidButton: Click on the center button to hide/show cobblestones
dialogueFirst2: I hope you got here without any problems.
dialogueFirst3: I would invite you to my house, but we have urgent business ahead of us.
dialogueFirst4: You can look around, but then go to the pedestal near the house.
dialogue1Level1: Here we are at the place. This is a field of magical stones. It is alarmed by the energy that is trying to get out of the ground.
dialogue2Level1: This energy creates cracks, which is what we need to fix.
dialogue3Level1: We need to place all the boulders available on these faults in order to begin the healing process.
dialogue4Level1: You will tell me which way to move them.
dialogue5Level1: Well, I hope you get the point. Let's get started!
dialogueEnd2Level1: No reason to relax, we still have a lot to do.
